trans-unit.source: Represents the menu structure of a form.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la struttura di menu di un form.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> replaces and adds functionality to the MainMenu control of previous versions, MainMenu is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> sostituisce al controllo MainMenu delle versioni precedenti, MainMenu viene mantenuto per compatibilità con le versioni precedenti e un utilizzo futuro, se si sceglie.

trans-unit.source: The MainMenu control represents the container for the menu structure of a form.
trans-unit.target: MainMenu (controllo) rappresenta il contenitore della struttura di menu di un form.

trans-unit.source: A menu is composed of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects that represent the individual menu commands in the menu structure.
trans-unit.target: È costituito da un menu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>gli oggetti che rappresentano i singoli comandi di menu nella struttura di menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> can be a command for your application or a parent menu for other submenu items.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>può essere un comando per l'applicazione o un menu padre per altri elementi di sottomenu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: To bind the MainMenu to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that will display it, assign the MainMenu to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Menu%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Per associare il MainMenu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>che sarà visualizzato, assegnare alla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Menu%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Menu%2A> MainMenu</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: For applications that will have support for multiple languages, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A> property to display the text of the menu from right to left to support languages such as Arabic.
trans-unit.target: Per le applicazioni con supporto per più lingue, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A>proprietà per visualizzare il testo del menu da destra a sinistra per supportare lingue quali l'arabo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create different MainMenu objects to represent different menu structures for your form.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare oggetti MainMenu diversi per rappresentare diverse strutture di menu per il modulo.

trans-unit.source: If you want to reuse the menu structure contained in a specific MainMenu, you can use its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A> method to create a copy.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera riutilizzare la struttura di menu contenuta in un oggetto MainMenu specifico, è possibile utilizzare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A>metodo per creare una copia.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have a copy of the menu structure, you can make the appropriate modifications for your new menu structure.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver creato una copia della struttura di menu, è possibile apportare le modifiche appropriate per la nuova struttura di menu.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Cutting and pasting menu items from one form to another in the designer might not work as expected if the form you are pasting into has no menu items defined.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Taglia e Incolla le voci di menu da un formato a altro nella finestra di progettazione potrebbero non funzionare come previsto se il form sta incollando non contiene voci di menu definiti.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> class without any specified menu items.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> classe senza un specificato di voci di menu.

trans-unit.source: This version of the constructor creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> without any specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Questa versione del costruttore crea un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>senza alcuna specificato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: To add menu items to the control use the other version of this constructor that accepts an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects as its parameter or use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere voci di menu al controllo utilizzano l'altra versione del costruttore che accetta una matrice di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>oggetti come relativo parametro o utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> class with the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> classe con il contenitore specificato.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> representing the container of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> che rappresenta il contenitore di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> with a specified set of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> con un set specificato di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: You can use this constructor to assign an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> at the time of its creation.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo costruttore per assegnare una matrice di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>oggetti per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>al momento della creazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> has been created you can add additional <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Dopo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>è stato creato è possibile aggiungere ulteriori <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>oggetti per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> objects that will be added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> gli oggetti che verranno aggiunti per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> that is a duplicate of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> che rappresenta una copia dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to create a copy of the menu structure stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo metodo per creare una copia della struttura di menu archiviata in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to reuse the menu structure stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> as the foundation for a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo metodo per riutilizzare la struttura di menu archiviati in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>elemento di base per un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to create a menu structure that has the same menu items as an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> but will also have additional <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects added to it, you can use the CloneMenu method to create a copy of the original <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> and then add the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the cloned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si desidera creare una struttura di menu che abbia le stesse voci di menu come un esistente, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>ma anche altri <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>oggetti aggiunto, è possibile utilizzare il metodo CloneMenu per creare una copia dell'originale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>e quindi aggiungere i nuovi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>oggetti al clonato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> that represents the cloned menu.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> che rappresenta il menu duplicato.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the main menu collapses.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si comprime il menu principale.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new handle to the Menu.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo handle per il Menu.

trans-unit.source: A handle to the menu if the method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un handle per il menu se il metodo ha esito positivo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Elimina le risorse, tranne la memoria, usate per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>in modo che la memoria occupata può essere recuperata tramite garbage collection.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>non è verranno liberate finché garbage collection di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>distruttore dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that contains this control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> contenente questo controllo.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine if a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is parented to a form.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente di determinare se uno specifico <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>è associato a un form padre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: The property is typically used when multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> objects are being used on a form and you need to determine which one is currently being used by a form.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà è in genere utilizzato quando più <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>vengono utilizzati gli oggetti in un form e per determinare quale è attualmente utilizzato da un form.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that is the container for this control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> che corrisponde al contenitore per questo controllo.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> is not currently hosted on a form.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> non è attualmente ospitato in un form.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Collapse"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Collapse"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento richiama il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnCollapse method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnCollapse consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the text displayed by the control is displayed from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta se viene visualizzato il testo visualizzato dal controllo da destra a sinistra.

trans-unit.source: This property enables your menus to support languages that are written from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente il supporto di lingue con scrittura da destra a sinistra nei menu.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `RightToLeft.Yes`, the menu item text will be displayed from right to left instead of the default left to right method.
trans-unit.target: Quando questa proprietà è impostata su `RightToLeft.Yes`, il testo delle voci dal menu visualizzato da destra a sinistra anziché da sinistra a destra.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For more information about how enabling right-to-left alignment affects Windows Forms controls, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Per ulteriori informazioni sugli effetti dell'abilitazione dell'allineamento da destra a sinistra sui controlli Windows Form, vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a valid member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Il valore assegnato alla proprietà non è un membro valido del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una stringa che rappresenta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The return string includes the type and the string returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ToString%2A> method if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is assigned to a form.
trans-unit.target: La stringa restituita include il tipo e la stringa restituita dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ToString%2A>metodo se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>viene assegnato a un form.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref>.
